description: Multiple light scuff marks and small chips in the finish on the top surface of the seat, mainly near the front edge.
evidence: Visible in multiple close-up and wide-angle photos of the chair's seat.

description: A significant crack runs across the top surface of the front right leg.
evidence: Clearly visible in a close-up photo of the front-right leg joint.

description: A minor crack is visible on the top surface of the front left leg.
evidence: Visible in a close-up photo of the front-left leg.

description: The glider shows signs of a poor repair, with excess white adhesive visible and a worn felt pad.
evidence: Close-up photo of the bottom of a leg, which is assumed to be the back left.

description: Excess transparent glue residue from a previous repair is visible on the exterior face of the front right leg, near the joint with the front apron.
evidence: Close-up photo of a joint showing dried, transparent adhesive.
